TopicTitle: The music you should play when disaster strikes

Articles.Content:
Similar to "The music you should play when you launch a rocket" by name. It can be when the kraken strikes, critical landing/launch failure, parts collide, parts break off, or over shot something. Here is my music for those situations: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=p2KI0tJ5yUA&list=PL94C2EF38B086CBEF&index=10&feature=plpp_video

Edited September 3, 2012 by Dusty926
